Title: A Room Without a View
Description:
This vault is of Black Dragon make which means its contents are my flight's property.

Normally I would have suggested we venture in together, but I was not expecting aggressive watchers. I will protect Rupert while you search for artifacts for us to examine.

To keep you safe, I will cast a spell on you I use when fighting the gronn.
ObjectivesText: Recover artifacts from the Buried Vault.
